# mirascope.core.base.structured_stream

<ApiType type="Module" />

## Description

This module defines the base class for structured streams.

## Module Attributes

| Name | Type | Description |
| ---- | ---- | ----------- |
| BaseStructuredStream |  | A base class for streaming structured outputs from LLMs. |
